Package edu.uci.inf111.SelfCheckOut.App

Interface Summary
Code The Code interface represents the methods common to Universal Product Codes (UPCs) and Bulk Item Codes (BICs).
ProductInfo The ProductInfo interface is implemented by any class which represents a saleable product in our store.
 

Class Summary
BIC The BIC class represents a Bulk Item Code.
BICTest  
BulkProduct The BulkProduct class represents a grocery product which is sold by weight, such as produce, deli, meat, etc.
BulkProductTest  
CheckOutCart The CheckOutCart class stores a Vector of GroceryItems which the customer has scanned.
GroceryItem A GroceryItem object represents a specific item which has been scanned by the customer.
PackagedProduct A PackedProduct represents a single UPC-code-bearing product in the store.
ProductDB The ProductDB class encapsulates the list of all products sold in the store.
SelfCheckOut The SelfCheckOut class contains the business logic of the sales point, and keeps track of the state of the current customer's checkout.
UPC The UPC class represents a Universal Product Code, a unique 12-digit code found on most packaged products.
Utils  
 

Enum Summary
SelfCheckOut.checkOutState This enumeration represents the four states of the SelfCheckOut system:
READY means the system is awaiting a new customer
ADDING means the system is prepared for another item to be added
BAGGING means the system is awaiting notification that the item has been placed in the bagging area
DONEADDING means the system is waiting for the customer to pay for their items.
Attempts to add items while BAGGING or DONEADDING result in errors.
